name: Assisted Living Center
overview:
Assisted Living Center is a leading resource of over 14,000 communities that provide senior living options throughout the U.S. In addition to assisted living, communities also offer the following types: independent living, memory care for alzheimer’s and dementia patients, in-home care, skilled nursing and nursing homes, and hospice.

Assisted Living Center offers several resources to help seniors and their loved ones begin the search to the right assisted living facility.

The main tool is the Assisted Living Facilities Finder where visitors can search by city and zip code to find browse facilities near them to find the right one that fits their living, daily services, and monthly budget.

The blog keeps users up to date on the latest state and federal senior living laws, news, and community updates.

There are also articles from “The Top 8 Signs your Parent May Need Assisted Living” to “Dealing with the Guilt of Putting a Parent in Assisted Living”
